about_the_game:
Bride into the Cave is an intricate Chinese folklore-inspired puzzle-solving game. The narrative unfolds in a serene, secluded ancient town in Xiangxi, where ancient secrets surround the tradition of the Cave Bride: once a beautiful girl is chosen to become the new bride of the cave deity, her soul vanishes from the mortal world.A Miao minority girl called Miao Fei embarks on her journey to uncover the truth behind the legend, and rescue herself, perhap.



Embark on a journey starting from the mysterious mountain cave, accompanying Miao Fei, a Miao ethnic girl in a red wedding dress, as you explore intricate puzzles and reveal the truth behind the legend of the cave deity. As revelations unfold, reality may prove more mundane than imagination, yet also more cruel.



With an art style imbued with ethnic customs and delicate hand-drawn illustrations, you are transported to a Xiangxi (a Southeastern region of China) world that is both real and unreal, mysterious yet simple.



Mysterious and ancient female script, Miao language, engrave enduring secrets. The narrative interweaves with puzzles. Delve into the intricacies behind the puzzles and let the truth about the Bride come to light.



This is a journey of self-discovery and liberation for a young girl, challenging outdated traditions. It offers players a picturesque and exotic experience in a seldom-explored region of China.
detailed_description:
Our Story



Hiya!

We are a group of fresh graduates from China, and joined the same gaming company. Like fate itself.

In our first real gig after graduation, following some training, we were quickly faced with our first assignment: design a MINI-GAME in just one month.

As you might have guessed, "Bride into the Cave" is the result of our collective effort.

The protagonist of "Bride into the Cave" is a girl named Miaofei. With a beautiful smile and jet-black hair, Miaofei's gaze is remarkably determined and resolute. She is quiet, doesn't speak much, but harbors a strong curiosity and eagerness to learn about everything. From a vague outline in our minds, she has now come to life, a character known by countless people. Among us are there is a folklore lover, a skilled storyteller, a talented artist, and a coding wizard. Looking back, Miaofei's story would have been incomplete without any one of us.

When it came to deciding the gameplay, our internal opinions were surprisingly aligned. Our initial intent was to pay homage to the predecessors of Chinese puzzle games, so we decided to make this game a combination of narrative and puzzle-solving, with a touch of suspense. The essence of Chinese suspense lies not in excessive blood and gore but in an atmosphere that subtly infiltrates your minds. We spent a considerable amount of time researching literature, even reaching out through friends of friends to confirm the meaning behind the Miao language songs, all to ensure the details were worth scrutinizing. Introducing female script, a unique Chinese script system for women, added an innovative touch to our puzzles.

We hope you enjoy playing this game, and Miaofei's story as well.



Currently, we've all been engaged with our work and have limited time for this game to be honest. However, all of us are determined to see this project through to completion for our audience. We will carry on with this title until it becomes an official release for the public eye.

So here's a small wish:

PLS WISHLIST US!

Seeing the wishlist count grow every day is the motivation that brings us together after work, continuing to strive for our dream!

Of course, being a group of novices, this is our first work. If there are any rough or green aspects, please bear with us and offer your guidance! Feel free to share any opinions and suggestions with us at any time.
